content: Oct 5 Yum China Holdings Inc's quarterly same-store sales beat estimates  driven by strong sales at its KFC restaurants  and the company said its CEO Micky Pant would step down.
name: Yum China Holdings Inc
title: Yum China same-store sales beat  CEO to step down

content: Oct 5 Yum China Holdings Inc's quarterly same-store sales beat analysts' estimates as its KFC restaurants served up strong results  and the company said its Chief Executive Micky Pant would step down.
name: Yum China Holdings Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Yum China same-store sales beat  CEO to step down

content: SHANGHAI/BENGALURU Yum China Holdings Inc  the operator of KFC  Pizza Hut and Taco Bell in the world's second-largest economy  posted quarterly sales slightly below estimates  dragged down by sluggish growth at Pizza Hut amid a turnaround drive.
name: Yum China Holdings Inc
title: Thin crust: Pizza Hut weighs on Yum China growth

content: SHANGHAI/BENGALURU  July 6 Yum China Holdings Inc  the operator of KFC  Pizza Hut and Taco Bell in the world's second-largest economy  posted quarterly sales slightly below estimates  dragged down by sluggish growth at Pizza Hut amid a turnaround drive.
name: Yum China Holdings Inc
title: UPDATE 2-Thin crust: Pizza Hut weighs on Yum China growth

content: * Yum China reports Q2 same-store sales growth of 3% and operating profit growth of 64%; loyalty members surpassed 100 million; mobile payment exceeded 40% of total company sales
name: Yum China Holdings Inc
title: BRIEF-Yum China reports qtrly earnings per share $0.27

content: July 5 Yum China Holdings Inc reported a 39 percent rise in quarterly profit on Wednesday  helped by strong sales at its KFC restaurants.
name: Yum China Holdings Inc
title: Yum China's quarterly profit jumps 39 pct on strong KFC sales

content: May 15 Yum China Holdings Inc said it would buy a controlling stake in food delivery services firm Daojia to expand delivery services for its KFC and Pizza Hut chains in the country.
name: Yum China Holdings Inc
title: Yum China to buy majority stake in delivery services firm Daojia

content: * Has entered into a definitive agreement to acquire a controlling interest in holding company of Daojia.com.cn
name: Yum China Holdings Inc
title: BRIEF-Yum China to acquire controlling interest in Daojia's holding company

content: SHANGHAI Yum China Holdings Inc  posted a slight rise in first-quarter same-store sales  helped by a jump in takeout demand and improvement at its flagging Pizza Hut brand as the newly spun-off firm looks to revive growth in the world's second-biggest economy.
name: Yum China Holdings Inc
title: Yum China posts positive first quarter on takeout sales  tax break

content: LOS ANGELES  Feb 7 Yum China Holdings Inc   reporting for the first time as a standalone company  on Tuesday said its profit beat expectations for the fourth quarter despite just missing Wall Street's target for sales at established restaurants.
